alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:47AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Thomas and southeastern Sherman Counties through 315 AM MDT/415 AM CDT/... At 247 AM MDT/347 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Brewster, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Thomas and southeastern Sherman Counties, including the following locations... Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 19 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to near zero visibility.
